title: Why is The Unforgiven II played live so rarely by Metallica? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wow the answers here are crazy, Reload is one of the most popular Albums of Metallica and Unforgiven 2 is a song that NO ONE CAN HATE. Its a master piece. The song is so amazing and well cosntructed it is hard for them to perform with the same elegance in live . Lars told it in in an interview and its not my words :)

Most songs from Load and Reload simply get glossed over. Very few people are particularly fond of either album. The first Unforgiven is also significantly more popular than the second or third, so there's that.
